identificationModule.briefTitle: Hysteroscopic Suture Fixation of Mirena in the Treatment of Adenomyosis
identificationModule.officialTitle: A Multicenter Randomized Controlled Trial of Hysteroscopic Suture Fixation of Mirena in the Treatment of Adenomyosis

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the efficacy and safety of hysteroscopic Mirena fixation in patients with adenomyosis with enlarged uterus, compared with simple Mirena placement under hysteroscopy. Whether the curative effect is not inferior to and reduces the incidence of Mirena expulsion.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: This study was a multicenter, randomized (1:1 allocation to each group), double-blind, parallel controlled trial.

armGroups.label: the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium ≥30mm
interventionNames: Procedure: A:hysteroscopic suture fixation of Mirena
Procedure: A: simple Mirena placement under hysteroscopy

armGroups.label: the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium <30mm
interventionNames: Procedure: B: hysteroscopic suture fixation of Mirena
Procedure: B：simple Mirena placement under hysteroscopy

interventions.name: A:hysteroscopic suture fixation of Mirena
interventions.description: A(the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium ≥30mm ):The Mirena is fixed to the uterine wall under hysteroscopy, and the endometrial tissue was routinely aspirated and scraped during the operation and sent for pathological examination.
armGroupLabels: the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium ≥30mm

interventions.name: A: simple Mirena placement under hysteroscopy
interventions.description: A(the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium ≥30mm):Mirena is routinely placed in the uterine cavity under hysteroscopy, and endometrial tissue was routinely aspirated and scraped during the operation and sent for pathological examination.
armGroupLabels: the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium ≥30mm

interventions.name: B: hysteroscopic suture fixation of Mirena
interventions.description: B(the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium\<30mm):The Mirena is fixed to the uterine wall under hysteroscopy, and the endometrial tissue was routinely aspirated and scraped during the operation and sent for pathological examination.
armGroupLabels: the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium <30mm

interventions.name: B：simple Mirena placement under hysteroscopy
interventions.description: B(the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium\<30mm):Mirena is routinely placed in the uterine cavity under hysteroscopy, and endometrial tissue was routinely aspirated and scraped during the operation and sent for pathological examination.
armGroupLabels: the thickness of the thickest uterine myometrium <30mm
